flawed_nl_solution:
The Lion King made 109 million in profit because 200 - 10 = <<200-10=109>>109
Star Wars made 218 in profit because 109 x 2 = <<109*2=218>>218
Star Wars earned 243 million because 25 + 218 = <<25+218=243>>243
#### 243

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 190, not 109. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
